mapper.sql: id, Categories, smallcategories, submittime, dizhi1, dizhi2, people, phone, photo, miaoshu, isdeleted, lianren, liantime, paifaren, paifatime, quality, endtime, x, y, yhzh, createId, createTime, delflag, paifabumen, sourceId, source, countrysideId
mapper.select:

distinct

order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.delete: delete from cgshangbao where sourceId = #{sourceId} and source = #{source}

update cgshangbao set Categories = #{categories,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, smallcategories = #{smallcategories,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, submittime = #{submittime,jdbcType=DATE}, dizhi1 = #{dizhi1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dizhi2 = #{dizhi2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, people = #{people,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, photo = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, miaoshu = #{miaoshu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isdeleted = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lianren = #{lianren,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, liantime = #{liantime,jdbcType=DATE}, paifaren = #{paifaren,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paifatime = #{paifatime,jdbcType=DATE}, endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=DATE} yhzh = #{yhzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delflag = #{delflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paifabumen = #{paifabumen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sourceId = #{sourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, countrysideId = #{countrysideId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update cgshangbao set lianren = #{lianren,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, liantime = #{liantime,jdbcType=DATE}, isdeleted = 1 where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update cgshangbao set paifaren = #{paifaren,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paifabumen = #{paifabumen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paifatime = #{paifatime,jdbcType=DATE}, isdeleted = 2 where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from cgshangbao where isdeleted = '0' or isdeleted = '1'
and yhzh like concat('%', #{page.yhzh}, '%')
limit #{page.currPage},#{page.pageSize}

select
from cgshangbao where isdeleted = '0'
and yhzh like concat('%', #{page.yhzh}, '%')
limit #{page.currPage},#{page.pageSize}
mapper.update: update cgshangbao set isdeleted=5 where id=(select id from cgshangbao where endtime < now())
mapper.select: select * from cgshangbao where miaoshu like '%${arg0}%' or Categories like '%${arg0}%' or people like '%${arg0}%' or phone like '%${arg0}%' or submittime like '%${arg0}%' or isdeleted like '%${arg1}%'

select * from cgshangbao
and Categories like '%${Categories}%'
and smallcategories like '%${smallcategories}%'
and isdeleted like '%${isdeleted}%'
and submittime like '%${submittime}%'
and endtime like '%${endtime}%'
select * from cgshangbao where paifaren like '%${paifaren}%'
select count(id) from cgshangbao where isdeleted=0 or isdeleted=1
select count(id) from cgshangbao where isdeleted!=0
select isdeleted,count(id) count from cgshangbao group by isdeleted
select count(id) from cgshangbao where delflag = 'A'

select * from cgshangbao
and lianren like '%${lianren}%'
select count(id) from cgshangbao where isdeleted=#{isdeleted} and delflag = 'A'
mapper.insert: insert into cgshangbao (Categories, smallcategories, submittime, dizhi1, dizhi2, people, phone, photo, miaoshu, isdeleted, lianren, liantime, paifaren, paifatime, endtime, x, y, yhzh, createId, createTime, delflag, paifabumen, sourceId, source, countrysideId) values (#{categories,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smallcategories,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{submittime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{dizhi1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dizhi2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{people,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{miaoshu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 1, #{lianren,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{liantime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{paifaren,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paifatime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{endtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{x,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{y,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yhzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paifabumen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countrysideId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update cgshangbao set Categories = #{categories,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, smallcategories = #{smallcategories,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, submittime = #{submittime,jdbcType=DATE}, dizhi1 = #{dizhi1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dizhi2 = #{dizhi2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, people = #{people,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, photo = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, miaoshu = #{miaoshu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lianren = #{lianren,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, liantime = #{liantime,jdbcType=DATE}, paifaren = #{paifaren,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paifatime = #{paifatime,jdbcType=DATE}, endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=DATE}, x = #{x,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, y = #{y,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yhzh = #{yhzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paifabumen = #{paifabumen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sourceId = #{sourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, countrysideId = #{countrysideId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update cgshangbao set delflag = 'D' where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into cgshangbao (Categories, smallcategories, submittime, dizhi1, dizhi2, people, phone, photo, miaoshu, isdeleted, lianren, liantime, paifaren, paifatime, endtime, x, y, yhzh, createId, createTime, delflag, paifabumen, sourceId, source, countrysideId) values (#{categories,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smallcategories,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{submittime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{dizhi1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dizhi2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{people,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{miaoshu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0, #{lianren,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{liantime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{paifaren,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paifatime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{endtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{x,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{y,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yhzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paifabumen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countrysideId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select count(id) from cgshangbao where isdeleted = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and paifaren = #{paifaren,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and delflag = 'A'
select count(id) from cgshangbao where isdeleted = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(id) from cgshangbao where isdeleted = 0 and submittime = #{submittime,jdbcType=DATE}
select count(id) from cgshangbao where isdeleted = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and paifatime = #{paifatime,jdbcType=DATE}
select count(id) from cgshangbao where isdeleted = 3 and paifaren = #{paifaren,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and paifatime = #{paifatime,jdbcType=DATE}
select count(id) from cgshangbao where quality = #{quality,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=DATE}

select a.isdeleted,ifnull(b.count,0) as count from cgisdeleted as a left join( select isdeleted,count(1) as count from cgshangbao where delflag = 'A' group by isdeleted) as b on a.isdeleted=b.isdeleted

select a.*,b.shangbaoid,b.chuliren,b.chulitime,b.chulimiaoshu,b.sheheren,b.shehetime,b.shehemiaoshu,b,shenheState,b.photo1 from cgshangbao a,cgchuli b where a.id=b.shangbaoid and a.isdeleted=#{isdeleted}
select count(id) from cgshangbao where isdeleted = 0 and delflag = "A"
select count(id) from cgshangbao where delflag = "A"
select count(id) from cgshangbao where isdeleted > 0 and delflag = "A"
select count(id) from cgshangbao where isdeleted > 1 and delflag = "A"
select count(id) from cgshangbao where isdeleted > 2 and delflag = "A"
select count(id) from cgshangbao where isdeleted = 3 and delflag = "A"
select count(id) from cgshangbao where isdeleted = 4 and delflag = "A"
select count(id) as count,QUARTER(paifaTime) as isdeleted from cgshangbao where YEAR(paifaTime) = #{col} and delflag = "A" GROUP BY QUARTER(paifaTime)
select a.*,b.shangbaoid,b.chuliren,b.chulitime,b.chulimiaoshu,b.sheheren,b.shehetime,b.shehemiaoshu,b.shenheState from cgshangbao a,cgchuli b where a.id=b.shangbaoid and a.id=#{id}
select * from cgshangbao where isdeleted=#{isdeleted}

select a.id as countrysideId,a.countryside_name as countryside,ifnull(b.count,0) as count from countrysideList a left join(select countrysideId,count(id) as count from cgshangbao where delflag = 'A' group by countrysideId) as b on b.countrysideId = a.id
select source as source, count(1) as count from cgshangbao where delflag = 'A' group by source
select count(id) as count,QUARTER(createTime) as quarter from cgshangbao where YEAR(createTime) = #{year} and delflag = 'A' GROUP BY QUARTER(createTime)
select count(1) from cgchuli where chulitime = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')
select count(1) from cgchuli where shehetime = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') and shenheState = '1'
select count(1) from cgshangbao where DATE_FORMAT(createTime,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')
